channel.title: Guatemal on OFF THE HAMSTER WHEEL
channel.description: Recent content in Guatemal on OFF THE HAMSTER WHEEL

item.title: Biking in Guatemala
item.description: The speed limits in Guatemala are 40 km/h (25 mph) or 60 km/h (37 mph) in built up areas, outside built up areas all roads are limited to 80 km/h (50 mph) All of the road signs for the main roads are Green with White writing and the local roads are Blue with White writing. The main roads in Guatemla are either tarmac or concrete and they are all generally very good and reasonably well maintained.
